com.microsoft.azure.management.network

Interface NetworkInterface.Update

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Appliable<NetworkInterface>, Indexable, Resource.UpdateWithTags<NetworkInterface.Update>
    Enclosing interface:
    NetworkInterface

    public static interface NetworkInterface.Update
extends Appliable<NetworkInterface>, Resource.UpdateWithTags<NetworkInterface.Update>
    The template for a network interface update operation, containing all the settings that can be modified.

    Call Appliable.apply() to apply the changes to the resource in Azure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NetworkInterface.Update withAzureDnsServer()
      Specifies to use the default Azure DNS server for the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withDnsServer(String ipAddress)
      Specifies the IP address of the custom DNS server to associate with the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withExistingPublicIpAddress(PublicIpAddress publicIpAddress)
      Associates an existing public IP address with the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withIpForwardingDisabled()
      Disable IP forwarding in the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withIpForwardingEnabled()
      Enable IP forwarding in the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withNewPublicIpAddress()
      Creates a new public IP address in the same region and group as the resource and associate it with the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withNewPublicIpAddress(PublicIpAddress.DefinitionCreatable creatable)
      Create a new public IP address to associate the network interface with, based on the provided definition.
      NetworkInterface.Update withNewPublicIpAddress(String leafDnsLabel)
      Creates a new public IP address in the same region and group as the resource, with the specified DNS label and associate it with the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withoutDnsServer(String ipAddress)
      Removes a DNS server associated with the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withoutPublicIpAddress()
      Specifies that remove any public IP associated with the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withPrivateIpAddressDynamic()
      Enables dynamic private IP address allocation within the specified existing virtual network subnet for the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withPrivateIpAddressStatic(String staticPrivateIpAddress)
      Assigns the specified static private IP address within the specified existing virtual network subnet to the network interface.
      NetworkInterface.Update withSubnet(String name)
      Associate a subnet with the network interface.

      • withSubnet

        NetworkInterface.Update withSubnet(String name)
        Associate a subnet with the network interface.
        Parameters:
        name - the subnet name
        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update

      • withPrivateIpAddressDynamic

        NetworkInterface.Update withPrivateIpAddressDynamic()
        Enables dynamic private IP address allocation within the specified existing virtual network subnet for the network interface.
        Returns:
        the next stage of network interface update

      • withPrivateIpAddressStatic

        NetworkInterface.Update withPrivateIpAddressStatic(String staticPrivateIpAddress)
        Assigns the specified static private IP address within the specified existing virtual network subnet to the network interface.
        Parameters:
        staticPrivateIpAddress - the static IP address within the specified subnet to assign to the network interface
        Returns:
        the next stage of network interface update

      • withIpForwardingEnabled

        NetworkInterface.Update withIpForwardingEnabled()
        Enable IP forwarding in the network interface.
        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update

      • withIpForwardingDisabled

        NetworkInterface.Update withIpForwardingDisabled()
        Disable IP forwarding in the network interface.
        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update

      • withDnsServer

        NetworkInterface.Update withDnsServer(String ipAddress)
        Specifies the IP address of the custom DNS server to associate with the network interface.

        Note this method's effect is additive, i.e. each time it is used, the new dns server is added to the network interface.

        Parameters:
        ipAddress - the IP address of the DNS server
        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update

      • withoutDnsServer

        NetworkInterface.Update withoutDnsServer(String ipAddress)
        Removes a DNS server associated with the network interface.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - the IP address of the DNS server
        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update

      • withAzureDnsServer

        NetworkInterface.Update withAzureDnsServer()
        Specifies to use the default Azure DNS server for the network interface.

        Using azure DNS server will remove any custom DNS server associated with this network interface.

        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update

      • withNewPublicIpAddress

        NetworkInterface.Update withNewPublicIpAddress(PublicIpAddress.DefinitionCreatable creatable)
        Create a new public IP address to associate the network interface with, based on the provided definition.

        if there is an existing public IP association then that will be removed in favour of this

        Parameters:
        creatable - a creatable definition for a new public IP
        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update

      • withNewPublicIpAddress

        NetworkInterface.Update withNewPublicIpAddress()
        Creates a new public IP address in the same region and group as the resource and associate it with the network interface.

        the internal name and DNS label for the public IP address will be derived from the network interface name, if there is an existing public IP association then that will be removed in favour of this

        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update

      • withNewPublicIpAddress

        NetworkInterface.Update withNewPublicIpAddress(String leafDnsLabel)
        Creates a new public IP address in the same region and group as the resource, with the specified DNS label and associate it with the network interface.

        the internal name for the public IP address will be derived from the DNS label, if there is an existing public IP association then that will be removed in favour of this

        Parameters:
        leafDnsLabel - the leaf domain label
        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update

      • withoutPublicIpAddress

        NetworkInterface.Update withoutPublicIpAddress()
        Specifies that remove any public IP associated with the network interface.
        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update

      • withExistingPublicIpAddress

        NetworkInterface.Update withExistingPublicIpAddress(PublicIpAddress publicIpAddress)
        Associates an existing public IP address with the network interface. if there is an existing public IP association then that will be removed in favour of this
        Parameters:
        publicIpAddress - an existing public IP address
        Returns:
        the next stage of the network interface update
